full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYOBS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GI GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI DA LTA SNYIGS MA'I DUS SU RNAM PAR DKAR PA'I BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I GANG ZAG NYIN GYI SKAR MA BZHIN 'GA' ZHIG YOD KYANG PHYUGS BZHI LONGS SPYOD MED NANG STONG STONG PO MED MED ZHES PA'I DBANG GIS RKYEN GYIS MA BYAS KYANG MA BYAS KYANG MANG PAS, NOR GYI LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I DNGOS GRUB ZHU BA GA-YANG 'GUGS KYI RIM PA DAMS PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI MDZAD PA MANG DU YOD KYANG, RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYABS BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR ZHES BYA BA'I MDZAD PA'I SOG BSKANG MDOR BSDUS ZHIG LAS GZHAN MED PAS, BLA MA DE NI THOB ZHIG YIN PAS SNGON NAS SHIS PA BYUNG BA'I GSUNG YIN PAS, DE LA THAB LHA BSKYED PA DANG, MCHOD PA BSANGS GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS KYIS KHA BSKANG TE THUN MONGS MA YIN PAS DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS LA DGOS PA MED KYANG, 'JIG RTEN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA BDAG 'DRA BA RES 'GA' LA PHAN SNYAM DKAR PA'I SEMS KYIS BSKUL TE, DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN PA AARTHA SIDDHI MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
